snippet.title: 12 Labours of Hercules X: Greed for Speed
snippet.description:
Hot summer day in a beautiful garden was going to be relaxing and peaceful as ever…until a powerful wave tore down everything in its path! What caused it? What kind of creature can move so fast that even the hero's sharp eyes can't see it? Hercules knows that he can't let the beast roam around and bring trouble to the land, so he decides to go after the creature. But he needs to catch up to it first! 
Join Hercules on the ultrasonic quest through Ancient Greece. Face the unexpected consequences of brewing a magic potion, discover secret boosts, travel to snowy mountain peaks and warm sea shores: everything is possible when you are moving at the speed of light! No time to lose - hurry up to play Hercules X: Greed for Speed!
